headline: 2026 outlook: AI Revolution comes to a halt without energy players
summary: Investors can easily look back on the themes that dominated markets (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) throughout 2025, so what are some of the top investment ideas they should be expecting or watching in 2026? Hint: it's still AI. Or more so, the companies that will be physically building out and powering the AI infrastructure. Hennion & Walsh CIO Kevin Mahn tells Julie Hyman how he is "following the money" and watching the companies that will ultimately become the true architects of the artificial intelligence buildout. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: Duke Energy vs. Exelon: Which Power Utility Stock Offers More Upside?
summary: DUK and EXC highlight how regulated utilities are leveraging clean energy investment, infrastructure upgrades and stable earnings to attract income-focused investors.

content.title: Duke Energy vs. Exelon: Which Power Utility Stock Offers More Upside?
